name: A Street Racer Car Crash Epic Games for Kids Free Fun
name_original: A Street Racer Car Crash Epic Games for Kids Free Fun
description:
Are you ready to race? How fast can you go? The cops are hot on your tail! Get this high speed racer for FREE today!

Get ready for the fastest street racing and police chase experience on the iPhone/iPad.

Race your heart out as you barrel, dodge and destroy your police tails through different levels across 4 different cities.

Earn as many coins as you can as you blow your police tails off the asphalt!

Street Racer is a total rush for real adrenaline junkies!

Game Features:
> 4 Fun and Challenging City Route Levels
> 7 Awesome Super Fast Cars
> Upgrades and Free Bonuses!
> Awesome Sound Effects
> Great Graphics!

So what are you waiting for? Quench your need for speed and start burning your nitros!

Download Street Racer now and satisfy your need for adrenaline today! And even better... it's FREE today!
